page.title: 08The Parish Churches
page.content: The Anglican Churches at Great Ryburgh, Stibbard and Gateley are served by the Reverend F. Ashton Hill who lives in the Rectory at Great Ryburgh. Services are poorly attended but fund-raising efforts are well supported by the whole village. There is a service at least once a day, times being varied - 7.30am,8.00am, 9.00am,7.30pm, Sunday at 10.15am - so that worship - usually the Eucharist - is available out of working hours. Baptisms, weddings and funerals take place at the rate of about 6 a year. Despite the general increase in cremations local people prefer burial in the churchyard.
